sentence.Network_en: It is difficult to praise this immaculately researched work too highly.
sentence.Network_cn: 这项研究工作毫无瑕疵，怎样称赞都不过分。

sentence.Network_en: As always he was immaculately dressed.
sentence.Network_cn: 跟往常一样，他穿得干净而整洁。
管弦乐队的演奏完美无瑕。

list.abs: A Silence Song - Current 93 ... Their corn burnt hair 焦灰的头发 Silence immaculate 精确无误 In a cave 在洞穴中.
faultless logic ; speaks impeccable French ; timing and technique were immaculate ; an immaculate record .准确无误的逻辑；说标准法语；时间和方法是无误的；无过失的记录。
天主教却发明了一个假的教理，也就是“无沾成胎说（Immaculate Conception）”。他们认为马利亚受孕之前，突然变成了没有罪的本 …
圣母受胎节（Immaculate Conception）1天  9  12月25日圣诞节 （Christmas）  2.5天  24日下午大部分人不工作，27日早上工作，2天 …
he wore an immaculate uniform for the date ., 他穿着整洁的制服去约会.

entry.tran: 干净整洁的;纤尘不染的
entry.def: If you describe something as immaculate, you mean that it is extremely clean, tidy, or neat.

example.ex: Her front room was kept immaculate.
...the waiter, dressed in immaculate bow tie and suit...
example.tran: 身着干净套装、蝴蝶领结一尘不染的侍者

entry.def: If you say that something is immaculate, you are emphasizing that it is perfect, without any mistakes or bad parts at all.

example.tran: 守门员的表现堪称完美。

sentences.sentence: "gone was the casually dressed Canadian she had thought a backwoodsman--this man was immaculately tailored"

sentences.en: It was a neatly furnished and immaculately tidy room.
sentences.cn: 这是一个家具简洁、干净齐整的房间。
